Player History
Signed as a free agent by Texas on 4/1/1985 to a minor league deal...
Injured on 4/13/1986 with a Broken Finger, out for 5 weeks...
Injured on 8/18/1988 with a Pulled Anterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 5-6 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/3/1989, off Mark Langston (SEA)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/4/1989, off Greg Swindell (SEA)...
Was selected to the 1989 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/31/1989, hitting .538 with 3 HR, 13 RBI...

Won Player of the Week award on 9/18/1989, hitting .611 with 3 HR, 4 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/25/1989, hitting .542 with 1 HR, 6 RBI...

Was selected to the 1990 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against Toronto on 8/26/1990...
Injured on 9/21/1990 with a Scratched Cornea Eye, out for 1-2 weeks...
2/2/1991: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,542,857 through salary arbitration...

Drove in 6 runs against Boston on 5/14/1991...
